background: A financial services company operates a mission-critical trading platform and needs to ensure full business continuity even during regional AWS outages. The solution must achieve RPO < 1 minute and RTO < 5 minutes during failover with automatic failover requiring no manual intervention. The system must maintain data consistency, service continuity, and cross-region availability with comprehensive monitoring, alerting, and health checks that automatically trigger failover when an outage is detected.
author: Gahdloot
